column5: This Geodesic Dome has an area of open living space. Ceiling is 23' high. Overlooks D/T Austin. Spectacular View! Master bedroom sleeps 2 and has adjoining loft/bedroom and 1/2 BR (URL HIDDEN)The loft area can sleep 2 guests. The common area can sleep 1 guest. The kitchen, full BR & 2nd BD is downstairs. The second bedroom accommodates 3 guests Sleeps 1-6 guests. A perfect romantic couples GetAway or plenty of room for good friends and family.
